name: Azmarq Technovation Private Limited
description:
Established in 2015, Azmarq Technovation is a prominent Cloud Communications Platform provider, offering innovative business messaging solutions. Our product stack empowers global businesses with WhatsApp, RCS, SMS, and more for impactful messaging experiences. Azmarq transforms customer engagement with the WhatsApp Business API, providing Rich Messages, swift responses, and personalized interactions. Our CPaaS platform caters to diverse communication needs, driving intelligent communication for 800+ Indian companies, managing billions of messages annually.

Why Choose Azmarq's WhatsApp Business Platform?
1.	Build Custom Integrations effortlessly
2.	User-friendly Dashboard with the latest WhatsApp features
3.	Access Advanced Reporting & Analytics
4.	Smart Resend Module and Segmentation
5.	WhatsApp Onboarding Support
6.	Dedicated Customer Support

Elevate your Tech Stack by integrating WhatsApp with Azmarq! For inquiries, contact us at info@azmarq.com. Visit: https://www.azmarq.com.
focus_areas: Alerts Notifications, Marketing & Automation, OTP Authentication
Omnichannel Communications and Multi Channel Application
WhatsApp Messaging & Conversational Commerce and Chatbots
